text: 2|170|aur jab unase[1] kaha jaata hai ki jo (quraan) allaah ne utaara hai, usapar chalo, to kahate hain ki ham to usee reeti par chalenge, jisapar apane poorvajon ko paaya hai. kya yadi unake poorvaj kuchh na samajhate rahe tatha kupath par rahe hon, (tab bhee ve unheen ka anusaran karate rahenge)
